formattedAddress: 1700 York Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1700 York Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text: Hosted my Son’s 18th Birthday on The Affinity and it couldn’t have gone any better. Wasn’t sure exactly what to expect and when I arrived Frank was there to greet everyone - the staff was outstanding, they hustled the entire time making sure everything was perfect. The ship was clean and comfortable. The food selection was expansive and the presentation of the food stations was impressive. Nancee was a pleasure to work with, she made sure everything went smooth in the back end. It was a great evening with beautiful weather.

originalText.text: Nancee is such a great person and professional I have had the opportunity to work with for several events on the Cornucopia Majesty Cruise. She makes sure everything works for you in a timely manner and helps you at any unimaginable detail you might need.  She is the kind of person you will always want to have in your team. She embraces your project and supports you with passion and commitment. If you have any request she will come up with a solution or a great suggestion. She is always there for you when you need it the most for the success of your event. She is awesome!

She is always there for you when you need it the most for the success of your event. She is awesome!

originalText.text: Although our event ended up having to be cancelled, Nancee was a dream to work with!  She is friendly, professional,  always willing to answer questions (some of them more than once).  I would not hesitate contacting Nancee again in the future if we need to plan a different event.  She was fabulous!

I would not hesitate contacting Nancee again in the future if we need to plan a different event.  She was fabulous!

originalText.text:
It is no surprise Yachts 4 All Seasons consistently receives 5 star reviews. The company is run by the owner Nancee who is completely hands-on and on top of every detail.
We chose Y4AS to charter a yacht for our daughter’s wedding on July 4.  I can’t say enough about the service Nancee provided which started from the very first inquiry about the event all the way to the end of the evening after the 160 guests left the boat.  Nancee went above and beyond to ensure everything was perfect including the yacht choice (Atlantica), florist (Langdon Florist), photographer (Beatrice Moritz Photography), and fireworks (courtesy of Macy’s).
The guests are still remarking this was the most epic wedding they ever attended.

The guests are still remarking this was the most epic wedding they ever attended.

originalText.text:
DREAM/FAIRYTALE wedding… Nancee is a very talented event planner… who became my fairy godmother.  From the moment we met Nancee to the very last moment of our dream/fairytale wedding, Nancee was our star guide.  Nancee helped create an unique personal experience, my husband refers to as our extravaganza.

Not knowing what we wanted our wedding day to be like, Nancee took the time to get to know us, who we were as individuals and as a couple.  Nancee invited us to wedding events, for us to see what was out there.  After showing us two(2) venues/yachts, she mentioned she has a venue she thinks may be what we are looking for… well, this third venue was it… Nancee nailed it… she took what she had learned from us and led us to our DREAM wedding destination.

During the wedding process, of music, photographers, flowers, table clothes, etc Nancee led, guided, discussed, listened… patiently allowed us to figure out what we wanted for our dream/fairytale wedding within the time frame we had.  Nancee made suggestions, redirected us when we need redirecting, kept us on top of decisions we needed to make right now and allowed us time when a decision could wait.

Nancee's communication with us as individuals and as a couple was excellent.  Nancee's experience allowed us to have access to the best of the wedding/event business.  I would HIGHLY recommend Nancee, Yachts for All Seasons for your next event or wedding… you and your guests will be in excellent hands with Nancee as your event planner.

Thank you Nancee, fairy godmother, for creating a dream/fairytale wedding extravaganza we will never forget and hold close to our hearts. xo
